ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My Lord, my people have denied me
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He prayed: "O Lord, verily my people accuse me of lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: "My Lord! My people have branded me a liar.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then Noah said, "Lord, my people have rejected me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “My Lord, my people have denied me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "My Lord! Verily, my people have denied me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: My Lord! Surely my people give me the lie!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'My Lord, my people have cried me lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: My Lord! Lo! my own folk deny me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Noah said, "My Lord, my people have rejected me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: my Lord! verily my people have belied me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘My Lord! Indeed my people have impugned me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my Lord! truly my people have rejected me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "My Lord! Verily, my people have belied me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'My Lord, my nation have belied me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “My Lord, my people have denied me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:117] He, Noah, said, ‘My Lord, my people have denied me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Noah said: (My Lord! Lo! my own folk deny me) regarding the message, and have killed those strangers who believed in me.
